      • validateMove

        public boolean validateMove(int oldX,
                   int oldY,
                   int newX,
                   int newY)
        this method check to see if the move made by other player (red) is valid or not
        Parameters:
        oldX - the player's piece old x coordinate
        oldY - the player'spiece old y coordinate
        newX - the player's piece new x coordinate
        newY - the player's piece new y coordinate
        Returns:
        this will return true if the move is valid otherwise return false

        Parameters:

        y - the piece's y coordinate

        Returns:
